description: Creates a history of location coordinates (long/lat) and provides it as a history dashboard stream

properties.name: historyname
properties.label: History Name
properties.description: Assign a name to this history to identify the stream to assign it to a dashboard component.

properties.name: assetproperty
properties.label: Asset Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the property that contains the name of the asset to track.

properties.name: eventtimeproperty
properties.label: Event Time Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the property that contains the time of the event. Leave it blank to use the time at which it arrives at this component.

properties.name: limit
properties.label: History Limit
properties.description: The limit of points in the history per asset.

properties.name: updateintervalsec
properties.label: Update Interval Seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds in which the updates are sent to the dashboard component.
